title: Mumble crash on startup with AMD Athlon XP 3200 (SSE)
body:
As reported in the forum https://sourceforge.net/apps/phpbb/mumble/viewtopic.php?p=4053#p4053
the Mumble client crashes on Windows XP with a AMD Athlon XP 3200.

The last version that does not have this issue is reported to be mumble-1.2.4-rc1-12-gdab8157.msi, which according to mkrautz is the last version from the old build system.


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1028/ .
